RL + Java Server Pipeline for EV Charger Placement

Reinforcement learning client + Java server pipeline for optimization-driven EV charger placement.

GitHub

Stack: Python, Java, RL, Optimization

Developed an end-to-end pipeline connecting an RL client with a Java-based server component for EV charger placement optimization.

What this includes:

  • Client/server interface for iterative optimization
  • Experiment tooling to compare strategies
  • Emphasis on reproducible runs and configuration-driven experiments
